abstract: The agreement is a triumph for CBS, which demanded fees from cable systems for subscriptions to local television stations that were traditionally free.
snippet: The agreement is a triumph for CBS, which demanded fees from cable systems for subscriptions to local television stations that were traditionally free.
lead_paragraph: In a deal that represents hundreds of millions of dollars in new revenue for CBS, the network said Monday that it had secured subscriber fees for its local stations from Comcast for the next 10 years.

headline.main: CBS and Comcast Reach a 10-Year Deal on Fees
headline.print_headline: CBS and Comcast Reach A 10-Year Deal on Fees
